Package com.linkedin.cubert.operator

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BlockOperator
    Operator that generates blocks.
    TupleOperator
    Interface for operators that generate tuples by processing input cubes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AggregationBuffer
    External Data Store used in Aggregation Operations
    BlockIndexJoinOperator  
    CollateVectorBlockOperator
    Given an input block with a pivoted column and a side meta-data block, create vector blocks for each input in metadata file.
    CombineOperator
    TupleOperator class that combines two or more cubes, while preserving the pivot key ordering.
    CubeOperator  
    DictionaryDecodeOperator
    A TupleOperator that translates the coded column values back to the original value by consulting the dictionary.
    DictionaryEncodeOperator
    Encodes columns in a tuple using a CodeDictionary.
    DistinctOperator  
    DuplicateOperator
    Custom operator needed for SPI and PYMK.
    ExtractMedianOperator  
    FilterOperator  
    FlattenBagOperator  
    GatherOperator
    Sequentially wraps multiple blocks into a one block.
    GenerateOperator
    Implements the GENERATE operator.
    GroupByOperator
    Group by operator implementation for the framework.
    HashJoinOperator  
    LimitOperator
    Sample the tuples from a data source.
    LoadBlockFromCacheOperator
    A BlockOperator that create block by loading data directly from external files.
    LoadBlockOperator
    A BlockOperator that create block by loading data directly from external files.
    MedianFlattenOperator  
    MergeJoinOperator  
    MergeJoinOperator.JoinSet  
    NullOperator
    An operator that does nothing.
    OperatorFactory  
    PhaseContext  
    PivotBlockOperator
    Pivots a block on specified keys.
    PostCondition
    Post condition of an operator.
    SortOperator
    An operator that sorts the given block on a given set of keys and returns the sorted data.
    TeeOperator  
    TopNOperator
    Tuple operator that works on groups and sorted data set to extract TOP-N tuples.
    UDAFOperatorAdapter
    Adapter method for efficient storage and handing of UDAF operators
    ValidateOperator
    Validate operator Used for debugging to validate the correctness of a block generation output
